analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/16/0xafbe321aa28ab653dd6d507acc38e71ee7b0c7c0.sol:
	Contract ElepigToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/16/0xafbe321aa28ab653dd6d507acc38e71ee7b0c7c0.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
